@graph.name: Easy Vegan Pumpkin Curry with Chickpeas | Vegan Ricah
@graph.description: This easy one-pot pumpkin chickpea curry is an Indian inspired autumnal curry made featuring warming spices, veggies, chickpeas, and pumpkin

@graph.name: Pumpkin Chickpea Curry
@graph.description: This easy one-pot vegan pumpkin curry with chickpeas is the perfect fall comfort food for the cold season! An easy, Indian inspired autumnal curry made featuring warming spices, veggies, chickpeas. Pumpkin pur√©e in the curry sauce makes it so creamy! !Perfect for weeknights!
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp paprika (or use 3/4 tsp smoked paprika, and 1/4 tsp cayenne)
1/2 to 1 tsp curry powder (or use garam masala or Berbere or Jamaican curry powder)
1 1/2 cup oat milk (or other thick non dairy milk such as coconut milk, or cashew milk)
1/2 cup other veggies such as butternut squash, (sweet potato, green beans, etc)
1/2 cup thinly sliced mushrooms (or veggies of choice )
lemon juice and pepper flakes for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Plate a skillet over medium heat, add the oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Plate a skillet over medium heat, add the oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the paprika, coriander, cumin, curry powder, and mix well. Cook the spices until they get fragrant and bubbly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the paprika, coriander, cumin, curry powder, and mix well. Cook the spices until they get fragrant and bubbly.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the onion, garlic, and ginger until the onion starts to turn translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the onion, garlic, and ginger until the onion starts to turn translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the pumpkin puree and mix in, add in the non dairy milk, and mix in, add the chickpeas, bell peppers, mushrooms, veggies, salt, and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the pumpkin puree and mix in, add in the non dairy milk, and mix in, add the chickpeas, bell peppers, mushrooms, veggies, salt, and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the veggies are tender to preference. Fold in the spinach and take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the veggies are tender to preference. Fold in the spinach and take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a good dash of lime juice, and some pepper flakes for garnish, and serve with rice, or other cooked grains.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a good dash of lime juice, and some pepper flakes for garnish, and serve with rice, or other cooked grains.

@graph.keywords: pumpkin curry recipe, vegan chickpea curry
